metadata.title: CVE-2012-4428 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
openslp: SLPIntersectStringList()' Function has a DoS vulnerability

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-4428` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libslp1 - 1.2.1-9ubuntu0.2
slpd - 1.2.1-9ubuntu0.2
slptool - 1.2.1-9ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openslp-dfsg package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2.1-9ubuntu0.2').
